agg.name: Aggregate
agg.description: Sentiment of all other items (message, name, description) combined.

message.name: Message
message.description: Sentiment of the Facebook post body, excluding article "preview" content.

name.name: Name (Headline)
name.description: Sentiment of the Facebook name (usually the news story headline).

description.name: Description (Article Preview)
description.description: Sentiment of the Facebook description field (usually an article preview).
